results.title: What are the Benefits of a Clean Driving Record? - Insure On The Spot
results.description: These rewards stack on top of your low base rate—making the savings even greater for drivers with a clean record. A significant benefit of having a clean driving record is becoming eligible for accident forgiveness programs. This means if you’re involved in an accident after maintaining a claim-free record for some time, your insurer won’t raise your premium for that first incident. Many major insurers, like Allstate, GEICO, and Progressive, offer accident forgiveness, but it’s usually available only to drivers with a clean record.
